# RemovableTagModel.PagesOfTag property

Set the page collection which have a particular tag.

```csharp
internal TagPageSet PagesOfTag { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

The page collection is used to provide the page count (number of pages with a particular tag). If the page count is 0, the tag isn't used anywhere. This property can be set only once
